item.title: Patching binary files in Linux
item.description: Patching binary files in Linux Using xxd Binary to Hex $ xxd prog1.

item.title: HowTo :: Install PyEnv
item.description: HowTo :: Install PyEnv Installing Dependencies sudo apt install -y make build-essential libssl-dev \ zlib1g-dev libbz2-dev libreadline-dev libsqlite3-dev \ wget curl llvm libncurses5-dev libncursesw5-dev \ xz-utils tk-dev libffi-dev liblzma-dev python-openssl Installing PyEnv curl -L https://github.

item.title: HowTo :: Install GEF (GDB Plug-in)
item.description: HowTo :: Install GEF Cloning Goto GEF Project and clone the repository to /opt

item.title: HowTo :: SSH access using a GPG key for authentication
item.description: HowTo :: SSH access using a GPG key for authentication Many of us are familiar with Secure Shell (SSH), which allows us to connect to other systems using a key instead of a password.
